DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The purpose study determine etiology weight increase Depot-medroxyprogesterone Acetate ( DMPA ) user . Method : Prospective study 100 woman , age 18-40 year old BMI < 30kg/m² , pair user non hormonal method follow two year . Will include woman never use DMPA . There evaluated habit , blood pressure , anthropometric measure , distribution corporal fat , lipid profile glycemia parameter every six month . Thirty woman control group perform euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp evaluate resistance insulin , adiponectin , neuropeptide Y , apolipoprotein A/B arterial evaluation ultrasound , intimal medium measure . Anova analysis repeat sample . The metabolic alteration elucidate etiology , begin sub clinical cardiovascular disease shown/discarded arterial evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: Depot-medroxyprogesterone Acetate ( DMPA ) Contraceptive Method Metabolism
DOC.criteria: 1840 year new user DMPA BMI < 30kg/m² diabetes mellitus 2 present fast glucose > 100mg/dl / blood glucose > 140mg/dl ingestion 75mg oral glucose firstdegree relative diabetes mellitus period lactation hypertension , without treatment hyper hypothyroidism chronic renal failure transplant organ woman use drug may relate weight gain / development insulin resistance chronic use corticosteroid , antipsychotic , statin , thiazide , hirsutism and/or hyperandrogenism polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) woman acanthosis nigricans woman use depoprovera point reproductive life , woman perform bariatric surgery
